title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Entrepreneurship in Developed Countries and Emerging Nations (EP 60026) Attainment of success with the application of entrepreneurship in developed nations, Economy saturation and its management by entrepreneurs, Importance of small business to the national economy, Identify the meaning of cultural diversity and how it impacts a small business for developed and emerging nations
